tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    comment TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysisResults (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_results (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    text VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    join_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_logs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
)
